title: Toward Patch Robustness Certification and Detection for Deep Learning Systems Beyond Consistent Samples
summary: Patch robustness certification is an emerging kind of provable defense technique against adversarial patch attacks for deep learning systems. Certified detection ensures the detection of all patched harmful versions of certified samples, which mitigates the failures of empirical defense techniques that could (easily) be compromised.
